results.content:
Instructor struggled with English at times and was difficult to understand on occasion. He let out a loud belch at one point which was disgusting and unprofessional and wasted a great deal of time correcting his own poor typing. In addition, the course does NOT teach Node JS. It literally had about a 7 minute overview on Node JS with little to no explanation of how or why to use it it a practical way. Same with the Promise content. I understand how Promises work, but he did not give a practical use for them. 

Overall, a decent introduction to Javascript, but misleading in that it is labeled as a Node JS class.

response.content:
Hi Christopher,

thank you for your review.
Regarding the belch, yep :)))) sorry, forgot to edit it out, would you pls be so Kinde and point out where exactly it is.
The problem with the content is that approximately 30% of the ES6 was lost doe to my transfer from PC to Mac due to a External HDD meltdown and 80% form Node.js 
An I mean recordings a code not just the edited videos. 
I am working on recreating everything in the upcoming months.
Hope this will change your opinion regarding my Course.
Best regards,
Norbert.
